promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a dynamic special lynx steel-type pokemon wearing grey gemstones. It can be found in mountain-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, steel or lynx. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Gryphix, a a dynamic special lynx steel-type pokemon. It can be found in mountain-like environments It has the following abilities: Hard Metal. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "lynx", "steel" or "Gryphix". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, lynx-like, special, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, grey shadows
generatedDescription: Sleek and durable, this metallic feline thrives amongst craggy peaks. Its Hard Metal power fortifies defenses while hunting in harsh terrain.
